info.title: Southern Puget Sound Salish spellchecker (mobile)
info.description: A spellchecker for Southern Puget Sound Salish, made by members of the language community, and by the Divvun and Giellatekno groups at UiT The Arctic University of Norway. Mobile phone version.

acceptor.title: Southern Puget Sound Salish speller lexicon
acceptor.description: Southern Puget Sound Salish speller lexicon compiled with HFST.

errmodel.title: Southern Puget Sound Salish error model
errmodel.description: Error model for Southern Puget Sound Salish, possibly with adaptions to mobile phone keyboards.
